website_summaries.verdict: If a red Power Wheels is on your child's list, this tough little toy won't disappoint.
pros: In addition to the fun Jeep Wrangler styling, this Power Wheels has a bright red color that catches kids' attention
Can fit 2 passengers and reach speeds up to 5mph
Can be driven on grass and pavement
cons: Requires some assembly, which can be a bit difficult

website_summaries.verdict: With two forward speeds and authentic styling, this Power Wheels Jeep is ready for adventure both on and off-road.
pros: Designed to imitate a Jeep Wrangler with realistic styling
Rolls well on grass and hard surfaces
Dual forward speeds of 2.5 mph and 5 mph
Best for children three to seven
cons: May not be as durable as expected

website_summaries.verdict: A big car with big features. This Jeep Wrangler packs a punch in terms of value and versatility.
pros: Rugged tires allow little adventurers to go on off-road expeditions
Large enough to accommodate two and offers storage space behind the seats
Speed can be adjusted as children grow, and car automatically brakes when the accelerator isn't engaged
Life-like details from top to bottom
cons: Instruction manual has room for improvement
Can struggle a little when reversing on grass

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my sons 2nd birthday this past weekend! He loves it. He is on the tall side for 2 and he can reach the gas peddle just fine (I was worried since it says over 3). Hes road it for a while (hour or so straight) and the battery has never completely died between charges. It is even strong enough to pull a little trailer my dad built for him to hall stuff / our dogs around in, this is not recommended I'm sure, but it does work!
customer_reviews.author: Janae Soto

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest Jeep. My husband and I always wanted one growing up, so we decided our niece needed one. We left the stickers off which made it feel a little nicer. She loves pink and purple so that’s all she needed to see. It was easy to assemble, it took less than two hours. It is pretty big once put together, so keep transportation in mind if you’re giving it as a gift. It barely fit in my Subaru Forester. She loved it so we’re very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Q. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for awhile before I wrote this review (almost a year). My son (soon to be 3) drives it almost everyday. We still have the original battery with it. It does need charged after about 30-40 minutes of continuous driving, but it is perfect timing to get him off of it. Otherwise, he would probably ride it for hours without stopping.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G

customer_reviews.title: Jeep great, battery life a disaster
customer_reviews.text: The car is great. The battery life is a joke... 10 minutes for the replacement ?The first battery only lasted one summer and now has a Literally a three minute life. Expect one good season the bye bye.
customer_reviews.author: steve1253

customer_reviews.title: shipped with broken and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Poor manufacturing and quality control. shipped with broken mount on body for wheel transmission. This was caused by over tightening screw at factory. Broken plastic mount and screw loose in box. This would have been obvious at the factory. Also other transmission broken due to over tightening, with 2 peices of black plastic loose in box. Missing 2 roll bar supports. Will ask for replacement of entire product 1 time and hope for the best, since broken parts are in high stress areas and will fail if repaired with epoxy or super glue. Looks to be a wonderful toy if made. properly
customer_reviews.author: Brian McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit of time to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Alot of peices to assemble. I of course used a battery operated screw gun to speed things up but still took almost an hour to put together. Down side is Some areas of the jeep like the chrome side pipe isnt fully coated, one mounting hole for a screw wasnt tapped/punched out from mold casting or what not so i had to drill a hole to mount 1 screw. The vehicle forward reverse direction switch lever has no resistance and is loose. 4 stars out of 5. Price was good. Overall look of jeep is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron from Philly

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this!!! It seems durable and my granddaughter is over the moon. The battery lasts a long time and at 5 mph she is not bored. Just for information: She is 5 yo, 45" tall @ about 50 lbs. She has plenty of room. Also, we replaced the mirror fake stickers with mirror material so she has side view mirrors for safety and so she can see how hard we are working to keep up. 5 mph is a very fast walk! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Daniels

customer_reviews.title: good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, good battery life. Not great on grass going uphill, but I think that's asking too much. Very heavy to lug around. Sturdy, quality is good, 'auto brake' feature when she stops pressing the gas stops it quick. Have yet to use it on the 'fast' setting. She got the hang of the forward and reverse shifter pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Jeep for Both a 6 yo and a 7 yo
customer_reviews.text: Power wheels wins when it comes to reliability. We have the Mustang car and that's pretty tight after the grandchildren turned 5. This jeep has much more room for their legs. The mustang does not have doors that open where this jeep has both doors open. The kids love both cars. It's so worth the price. We spent $450 on a terrible jeep (12 Volt Ride on Car by Moderno Kids) that gave our family nothing but problems. Battery problems, remote control problems, you name it. We would only buy Power Wheels moving forward from our personal experiences. The price point is fantastic, the car and jeep work so well. The grandchildren love both so of course so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t assemble- broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even put it together because the wires were snapped off of one of the gearboxes. Contacted customer support and it will be days before I get a response, and by then it will be after Christmas and this is a Christmas gift for our kids. I’m glad we didn’t wait until Christmas Eve to put it together because that would have been even more frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lauwa

customer_reviews.title: Xmas ruined by missing rear axle- can’t drive
customer_reviews.text: God princess jeep is present for my four-year-old for Christmas. Looks great coming out of the box except for missing rear axle. Who forgets to put an axle in the box? Missing pieces make it impossible to drive! Can you imagine my four-year-old disappointment when her present is a dud in the garage! This is unacceptable! Contacted hot wheels and part is on nation wide back order and not to arrive until February! Feel like we should get a refund or at least the part! If not a new car! Christmas was ruined.
customer_reviews.author: LB Skatt

customer_reviews.title: This jeep is great. Took a few hours to put together by ...
customer_reviews.text: This jeep is great. Took a few hours to put together by myself but I was a bit distracted by the tv so I think it could've gone more quickly had I applied myself. My son loves it but the best part is that I fall just under the weight restrictions so after all those years as a child of wanting one of these, I can finally FINALLY live my dream and drive it around myself. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this car but a month after Christmas the battery would not charge. Huge disappointment. I purchased before Christmas so we are outside the 30 day return.
customer_reviews.author: Darline Coughtry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car for two little girls
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love this car. It's still large enough for the six year old to enjoy for a few years. Very cute. Her favorite color of pink with her favorite Disney princesses on it. Has two speeds, and the slow speed is VERY SLOW, so parents don't need to worry. Large enough for both of them to comfortably ride in together. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Something is not right
customer_reviews.text: Something is not right. Some holes were cover in plastic and did not line up to other hole. See pic of covered. Some screws missing. Instructions seem to be outdated. Maybe a new model came out. Something is not right. Daughter likes her jeep but very frustrating. Yea i could return/exchange it but then I would have to start all over on rebuilding
customer_reviews.author: Spyros

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for 2 toddlers with 12V power!
customer_reviews.text: Overall great fun from 3 to 7 drivers and passengers. Passenger can be 1.5 yo baby but some risk of whiplash due to off on accelerator switch so i suggest the low speed. found the assembly kind of confusing for the electric motors which float even though the design supports mounting but seems reliable so far after one summer. Charging easy but no full charge led which is disappointing. Atv style 12V vehicles can handle much larger drivers but this car is safer for passenger and driver.
customer_reviews.author: TKS

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to assemble. The back wheels baffled me and honestly took more time than the rest of the Jeep to get together. The instructions weren’t the clearest on how they were supposed to set. We were missing a piece and Fischer price sent a replacement that we received that week, it was a small steering wheel cap. My 11 and 2 yr old ride around in it. The little one has plenty of room (it is hers) and the 11y is cramped but they both fit. I’m happy with the battery life on it too. I only charge it once a week. I haven’t tested to see how long it goes before dying
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: You have to assemble it yourself and put the decals as well. Runs like a beast! The kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Will1

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We received this jeep and it was missing parts to hold the motors in place. My son (an engineering student) assembled the whole thing and found that the pieces were missing. I have tried to contact someone in several different ways to get the missing pieces, but have had no luck. I do not want to return the jeep because it is already put together. My son built the missing pieces and installed them so that the jeep now functions. When I buy a product, I would like to receive all of the pieces. Very disappointed. Amazon, do you have any way of addressing this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Keena Bait

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good truck. We got this for our daughter after looking at all the reviews. I think we made the right choice. Our daughter loves it. It's easy to learn to us, our daughter figured it out in about 15 mins. Battery lasts pretty good. Only problem was some pieces were cracked, it didn't affect the assembly of the truck, but it would have been nice if it wasn't cracked. Wood have given 5 starts if not for the cracked pieces.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: BAD service IF anything goes wrong
customer_reviews.text: When arrived, hood damaged! I Tried & Tried to get that piece replaced! I spent SO many hours on the phone/online & frustrated!!! Seriously! MAD! This was a Christmas gift for an out of town Grand Child & a big chunk of the hood is broken! Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters gift for Christmas morning and it’s missing an axel. So frustrating because after lots of research other brands this was the biggest complaint so I chose this one and it still happened!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri George

customer_reviews.title: My grands loved this! It rides a little rough
customer_reviews.text: My grands loved this! It rides a little rough...wheels of plastic worries us a little as far as durability is concerned (4 stars). Four grands took turns riding and driving it...all loved it! The oldest was 8...she was a tad big for it. We figure it will do for at least a couple of years for grands who are 2,4,6 and 8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: V Waits

customer_reviews.title: Magnificant Quality
customer_reviews.text: This car is extremely well manufactured, fantastic quality. Yes, assembly was required, but that's a great way to add the love to it, realizing it's being assembled in love for the little one it's meant for. The assembly instructions were very clear, easy to follow. Our grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out on small hills.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts out on small hills. Over current protection is far too sensitive. ***Update to initial review. Still cuts out on hills. Gear box needed to be replaced within a year. This PW Jeep is nowhere near as tough as the old pink barbie jeep I pulled out of the trash and gave my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Antarctica

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!  The grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is the cutest little thing I ever saw. My grandkids are having a blast with it! And the more joy they get out of it the more my husband and I get out of it! My husband put it together. He had a hard time. He had to take it to work for his co worker to help. But all it all it is worth the time and energy my husband put in to it!
customer_reviews.author: ChattyLMS

customer_reviews.title: Buy this not big toys!
customer_reviews.text: First I bought a big toys green country 4x4 jeep. Absolute garbage, had to repair it 5 times the first year and still wasn't right so I gave it away. This power wheels jeep is awesome! Lots of aftermarket parts if you want it customized. It's got plenty of speed and power and turns on a dime. My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: John Shoup

customer_reviews.title: Seats 2 and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE THIS!!! ages 2 and 4 and they have a blast in the backyard. Our 4 year old had to help the 2 year old a little since he is learning how to “drive” :). I love how it seats 2 when others I looked out only sat 1. It also has a small storage area behind the seats and they put their toys, snacks or helmets in there. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jarcuri

customer_reviews.title: No way is this a 12v
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesnt stay charged long and there is no way this is a 12V. Top speed down Hill was 3 mph. But speed on flat is 1 to 2 mph. This thing is super slow and gets stuck A LOT in the yard. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Fun car
customer_reviews.text: I like this powerwheel can fit my 3 year and 5 year old. I had a little difficulty accembling it because some screw holes are not evenly matched. The speed is good for little kids. My kids like it but it is too heavy for me to move it when the battery is out.😅
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of a pain to put together but I'd imagine they all are. Our kid's love it. They both fit in it comfortably and they did not in their old one. This things also goes fast and drives easily around the yard and up hills while their old one did not. I'd say it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Electrical contacts for engines are very flimsy, and had snapped off before we even finished putting this thing together. What a complete waste of time and money. Of all the things you would think they might put a moment of thought into, it would be the engine. It looks good, but this is a totally flimsy piece of junk. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bloeser

customer_reviews.title: Great vehicle for the price
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this vehicle. It is easy to use and moves at a faster speed than others. Had trouble assembling the wheels but eventually figured it out. My son broke part of the stick shift off but it’s still useable. Can easily fit 2 kids at a time which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: My boys love this jeep
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this jeep. They would literally live on it if i would let them! It has two speed settings (slow and fast) of course they like the faster speed. It also has reverse. Its very sturdy, my boys crash it into everything.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Hires

customer_reviews.title: Fast little Jeep
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her jeep and so does every other kid in the neighborhood! Big kids included! This little Jeep is fast!!! The boys don’t care how pink and girly it is, they’re ready to speed away. It was easy to put together but it did take some time. There was a crack in one of the pieces but it’s not visible and doesn’t impact the Jeep working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Missing!
customer_reviews.text: Battery was not included in the box! Bought for Christmas and had to run around last minute to find a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Ben D.

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last long. You will need to buy two to change out so your little can ride for a reasonable amount of time. Charging is 12-18 hours
customer_reviews.author: dakota andersen

customer_reviews.title: which is a bit funny to watch since she is way too big for ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this thing... wish I would have bought it for him sooner. It struggles a bit on hills and the wheels have a tendency to spin because the "tires" are just plastic. Not sure why the manufacturer doesn't improve the tires by adding a bit of rubber to the design. There are a bunch of crazy Youtube videos out there for modifications that can be done in this regard. My 11 year old daughter even loves it... which is a bit funny to watch since she is way too big for it... although it does still go despite her size.
customer_reviews.author: Merasbo

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this product because it ruined 2 sets of grandchildren’s Christmas. I bought 2 of them 1 for 2 families. BOTH were missing parts and were unable to be put together. My other set of grandchildren got one from their parents at a store from me. So I had 4 sad grandchildren on Christmas morning when they didn’t get a car! Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Strong MD

customer_reviews.title: Will make any kid happy!
customer_reviews.text: I think the battery has lasted us a little over a year, other than that, no issues! My kid loves this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dundr

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: I got it on sale, it’s a pain to put together the front bumper, and already fell. Needs longer screws. The rest was easy, took me an hour, Just that piece. It’s small probably for only 6 y/o and younger. Fun car
customer_reviews.author: LO S-G

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about it driving well on grass but it does great. Met or exceeded all our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: recommend you don't wait until the last step to put ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this thing! I would have given it 5 starts, but there were two nit-picky things. First, recommend you don't wait until the last step to put the stickers on it. Put the stickers on as you go. I think that would be so much easier. Second, in 'low' or 'slow' gear, its pretty much worthless on the grass. Once you take the screw out for 'high' or 'fast' gear it does pretty good on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T. Stabler

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with small piece broken
customer_reviews.text: This review would have been five stars, but there was a small piece of plastic broken off the main frame of the car. It wasn't very noticeable after putting it all together, but still. Paying full price for new, you hope this doesn't happen. Box wasn't damaged at all. Wasn't very difficult to put together. Be very careful with the decals though, they are not very forgiving if you mess them up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016 and here it is 2018 and it still looks and runs like brand new. I bought one I red also. I can't believe I spent so much on two of there but anything for my babies.
customer_reviews.author: brandie carter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little one and he is obsessed. Loves it more than anything. Named it and wants to use it all the time. He loves the fast speed but I gotta say be ready to speed walk to keep up or ride a bike cuz it can cruise. It still amazes me that he drives so well even in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Simple Jeep, but rides easily over different surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this had headlights that worked and a way to listen to music. Otherwise, it’s great. Battery lasts a long time (my son has ridden about 4-5 times so far without having to charge). It does through long, wet grass and over gravel with no issues. My son loves that it’s a two seater.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great Two Seater Jeep!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 4 year old grandchildren love this two- seater Jeep. It didn’t take them long to learn to handle it, including the reverse. We still have it set on the slower speed (mainly for our peace of mind). It works awesome in our backyard on grass. I did happen to have a strap long enough to wrap around the back of the seats that also snaps and adjusts tightness around them to use as a seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Great, but missing instructions and stickers out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this truck! It was the highlight of the birthday party. It did not come with the stickers (or instructions) but we found the instructions online and they mailed us the stickers (after a lot of run around on the phone and them wanting me to to drive 45 minutes away to pick up said stickers). Beside that, quality fun truck....sorta scary that my three-year-old nephew is driving this thing around but I guess it's my brother's problem now!
customer_reviews.author: AM1979

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! The only thing to note is that this version doesn't have the doors. We have another power wheels jeep with doors, and I just assumed they were all the same. They're all a little different. We love the two seats.
customer_reviews.author: Anie D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this Jeep. She’s zooming all around. Mom says she’s happy and it’s a good present and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: jmast

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally bother with reviews but decided to post one for this item b/c it was REALLY easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I just finished assembling this jeep for my son's 3rd birthday present. I don't normally bother with reviews but decided to post one for this item b/c it was REALLY easy to assemble. I did it by myself (33 year old female!) and used a power drill for all the screws. The instructions were very clear and it took me about an hour and 20 minutes to assemble and then another 5-10 minutes to do the decals. It's exactly as pictured, very sturdy, room for two riders. I can't wait for my son to see it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Puglisi

customer_reviews.title: ... for our 3 year old grandson and it was love at first sight for him
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 year old grandson and it was love at first sight for him! He is on it constantly! It arrived in great time and took about two hours to put together. Instructions very easy to follow. The toughest part is getting all the decals placed nicely! As others have indicated, I wish the wheels were made out of a tougher material as I can see this getting a LOT of use and is driven on mostly asphalt for him right now, but it has no problem on that or grass. Best purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded our expectations. Great power wheel and loved the design. The only downside, not starts taken because of this, it requires two people for fast and efficient assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Joel G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Daughters 4th birthday present. She loves it and so do we. She fits perfectly in the jeep and the battery lasts awhile with just her riding in it. Satisfied customer. Plan on po icibg up an extra battery just so she can ride all day.
customer_reviews.author: katie michelle lavely

customer_reviews.title: Have always been satisfied with Power Wheels Brand
customer_reviews.text: Great size and power. My 2year old grandson is having a blast. He was a little out of control for a few days until figuring out the steering. This should be a great toys for years to come. Both my son's received Power Wheels Jeeps at age two and used for years!
customer_reviews.author: K Hammer

customer_reviews.title: JEEP
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter drives this all over the yard. Goes good on grass at higher speed especially. Yard is uneven in spots and goes good even on hills. Packaged well and all parts were there. Now, I gotta say it was not the easiest thing I ever put together. Lot of parts. Instructions are pretty clear, but had a hell of a time with the rear axle and wheels. But all in all 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Hey wow, it’s great. Power Wheels always makes the price worth it. It is sturdy safe and my daughter enjoys just packing stuff in it without the “go”.
customer_reviews.author: gregg

customer_reviews.title: Test before giving as gift to a 4yr old
customer_reviews.text: Shifter was broken, had to call power wheels the day after Christmas to order replcement part
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate! Lots out there but by far the best of all of them. Both grandsons can ride in it. I had put a couple of bricks in back for added traction as tires are light weight plastic and offer very little traction. But they love it and battery lasts for hours of fun
customer_reviews.author: JohnWR

customer_reviews.title: This JEEP is awesome! Runs great
customer_reviews.text: This JEEP is awesome! Runs great, no concern about flipping it due to the width, and it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: N. Georgia camper

customer_reviews.title: A fun ride
customer_reviews.text: My kids had one of these growing up so it became necessary to buy one for the grandkids and they are enjoying it just as much as the original we had many years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry White

customer_reviews.title: real good instructions and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived intact, real good instructions and easy to put together. It's well built and very roomy on the inside...does very well on grass. My son has been riding it for a week on the same battery charge. He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great even with two children riding in it at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 3 year old grand son. It works great even with two children riding in it at the same time. I am very impresses with it's ability to run on uneven ground and as well as up hill. Of course the best review is from my grandson who just loves its.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old learned to steer quickly. My 1.5 year old drives it with a pillow propping her up. Loads of fun. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing part- not worth the hassle, bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself is fine- we bought it three weeks ago and still haven’t used it because a part was “missing” and is on backorder! The only thing the company offered to do, was to ship it weeks later when it’s expected to be in stock. We will not be buying anything power wheels again because customer service is so awful. The toy is easy to put together, but takes about three hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: He da for a 3-4 year old. Easy to build, and my kid loves it. We take to the park, around the neighborhood. The only thing is that it doesn’t come with a parent control so your kids have to control it all by themselves. Also it does not have a seat belt or doors, so if you kid moves or stands up it can be dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Jalon

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad - looks good and drives well
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad - looks good and drives well. The steering is a little tight for my 3 year old - can't tell for sure whether it's due to my installation. Reserve 1.5 hours for the assembly - instruction manual was pretty clear.
customer_reviews.author: Shihab Ullah

customer_reviews.title: Axle trouble
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loved this Jeep. We had trouble with the back axle, it keeps moving out of place and causing the car to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: Good product would do a five but I was short 2 screws I had to get some . Make sure you have extra in case
customer_reviews.author: Roger Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and it's great for teaching early driving skills.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a power wheels as a kid, but never got one. I get to live vicariously through my son now, and I am jealous of him. It looks awesome. He loves it. I am so glad we bought this for him. As an added plus, he's getting really good at steering and driving around obstacles. This is a great way to train hand-eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Teh Pickle Jar

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs UP
customer_reviews.text: Jeep was easy to assemble after the pieces were organized. The battery was charged 16 hours as recommend and it is still operating on that first charge after 30 days. He rides his jeep daily and often on grass which I assume would draw more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience! I ordered this Jeep as a Christmas gift for my daughter and the Jeep came without the decal stickers that make the vehicle a “princess” jeep. My daughter will wake up on Christmas morning to a plain Jeep with no decals on it. I feel terrible and the best Amazon could do for me was a 10% discount.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Very cute power wheels
customer_reviews.text: this is very cute power wheels, took me almost 2 hrs to assemble it, some of the screw holes dont align and makes it a little harder. it doesnt have parental control just like what the description said. over all its so sturdy and very cute. my 3 yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Got two for twin boys. Almost a year now. They ride them in the woods too. There favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part!!
customer_reviews.text: $300+ and it came with the box half ripped open and WITHOUT A REAR AXLE!! If you’re buying this for a special occasion, go to a physical store to purchase so that if this happens to you, you can return it much quicker and hopefully get a replacement the same day!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Rulison

customer_reviews.title: battery doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality seems good, and it's sturdy. The battery only lasts about 30 minutes on a full charge and it takes 18 hours to charge it each time. That is very disappointing. It really should be rated for 3-5 years old, as leg room is very cramped for even a six year old.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jeep for a little girl 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great jeep my little girl loves it. Im a auto mechanic and tradesman so it was easy for me to assemble. But to the average father that doesnt know how to work with tools id say they would have a little bit of a hard time. But overall its sturdy, fast , and reliable and looks really girly and princessish lol so my daughter likes it
customer_reviews.author: Ev0_x_11C

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love it so I keep buying them but they keep ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have bought and it dies after a few months of use. My grandchildren love it so I keep buying them but they keep dying. Fun while it runs!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Twombly

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the rear axis. Vendor is a 3rd party reseller and could not help with getting the missing piece. Had to deal with manufacturer directly and how to see a very upset boy bc the car was not drivable. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mariale

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This Jeep arrived missing the rear axle pole that holds the rear tires in place. Also arrived with two 6 inch cracks located on the driver's side wheel well.
customer_reviews.author: Googly

customer_reviews.title: You'll need tire treads unless you're into rescuing the keep ...
customer_reviews.text: You'll need tire treads unless you're into rescuing the keep every two minutes from being stuck. I mounted bicycle tires on all 4 wheels. After mod - 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it in Christmas morning and she’s loves it. My daughter is 2! Great fisher price quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolaos Zotos

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her princess power wheels and I loved how easy it was to put together. Also it holds a goodcharge!
customer_reviews.author: Shawlynn26

customer_reviews.title: Missing Battery — Seller Alphaben
customer_reviews.text: Jeep arrived without battery, and box was damaged - so the plastic on the side of the Jeep was damaged. Currently reaching out to seller (alphaben) regarding a return. Will update review upon working with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price. Fairly easy to assemble, One of the screws holding the electric motor was missing, but really does not seem to matter once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made The bar connecting the two front ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very well made The bar connecting the two front tires was not the correct length. It was to short resulting in the front left tire towing in instead of straight. However a replacement was sent right out at no expensive to me
customer_reviews.author: Prime user

customer_reviews.title: could go faster
customer_reviews.text: doesnt go very fast....in fact goes pretty slow. my son is almost 4 and weighs about 36 lbs and its STILL slow at full charge....would like it to go a bit faster. looks super cute though....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: drives well
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters 3 and 5 love riding together. Well made and moves right along on the high speed.
customer_reviews.author: M. France

customer_reviews.title: Fun Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I would like to see is some type of passenger seat belt so our younger grandkids could ride along.
customer_reviews.author: STUG48

customer_reviews.title: Great ride on keep for 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughters 4th birthday, runs great, arrived fast. Wish I would have bought extra battery because she likes to drive it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 and 5 year old who ride together. This has plenty of power for them. I wish it had a. Adjustable seat for the little one but it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great price, 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my 4 year old grandson & was a huge hit! My son stated that assembly went well with no problems. My grandson loves it! He enjoys taking his younger brother for rides & is enjoying it. He especially likes the rear storage to carry his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen K. Bocich

customer_reviews.title: Great jeep
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. Works great. My 3 year old has trouble understanding how to get it to go but likes sitting in it and trying.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it! He is just ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it! He is just big enough to reach the pedals and steering wheel. Although it will probably be another year before he fully gets the hang of steering. In the mean time we walk along side him as he drives and correct the direction of the jeep as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great power keep for a princess!
customer_reviews.text: Thus is a well made power wheel car. Just princess on the outside! But a power wheel car!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mc

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wheels rub a little if sharp turn. No traction in wet grass. Battery goes dead fast. Kid loves it. Loves the "stereo". It is cute.
customer_reviews.author: sheltongenie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: The jeep I received had a broken area on the frame and battery lasted about 2 minutes after being fully charged. Christmas was ruined for my grandkids. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my grandson. Loved it. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Virnich

customer_reviews.title: In general good
customer_reviews.text: The car is in general quite good. We got it with a discount price; otherwies it is too expensive. The car is very large to fit two kids, maybe three if they are not big. The steeling wheel is easily torn down.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

product_meta.title: Power Wheels Hot Wheels Jeep Wrangler, Blue (12V)
product_meta.description:
Style:Hot Wheels Blue (12V)Off-roading is really a term for people who actually believe in roads, and when your little one is riding in the Fisher-Price Power Wheels Hot Wheels Jeep battery powered riding toy, They may just start to believe that roads are only Suggestions. This tough riding toy moves on a 12-volt rechargeable battery that provides a max speed of 5-mph going forward and 2.5-Mph in reverse, but there's a safety speed lock-out to limit the speed for novice drivers. Realistic Jeep touches like the grille, frame, and roll-bars give it an authentic look, while a pair of AA batteries give them real tunes and realistic engine noises. The wide wheel-base offers stability and a roomy storage area lets them take along a snack or other must-have items while they're out on the trail. 2.5 and 5-mph, Max. Going forward; 2.5-Mph Max. In reverse. Ages 3 and above. Maximum weight capacity: 130 lbs.. Classic Jeep style on their very first car. Steel frame, storage area and safety speed lock-out. 12-Volt rechargeable battery with charger.

BRAND STORY
Power Wheels - the only way to ride. Is your wanna-be driver looking to gain some behind-the-wheel confidence? We’ve got just the right Power Wheels vehicles—and so many new ways to ride—to empower them to hit the road! Kids at our Fisher-Price Play Lab put these vehicles to the test, so you can feel good giving your kid the thrill of independence as they drive off in in their very own ride-on car, truck or ATV. These battery-powered riding toys are built for hours of fun and endless backyard adventures for toddlers to more experienced drivers!
feature_bullets: Your purchase include One Power Wheels Hot Wheels Jeep Wrangler | Charger & user manual
Weight limit – 130 lbs. | Seat dimensions – 18” L x 8” W | Recommended age – 3 to 7 years | Battery Voltage – 12V
Doors open & close for easy in & out |Drives on hard surfaces & grass
Drives Max. forwards 5 mph (8 km/h) | Max. reverse 2.5 mph (4 km/h)
